name: Mercy (Overwatch) LORA
description:
My tenth Overwatch LORA. Original appearance + Witch + a bit of Doctor. This one is quite flexible and modular, add what you want as you see fit in both positives and negatives.

  • Main trigger\Face - mercy, high ponytail, hair tie

  • Original outfit - mechanical halo, bodysuit, long sleeves, gloves, loincloth, brown legwear, armored boots

  • Witch outfit - witch, witch costume, witch hat, book on belt

  • Wings - mechanical wings, for spread out yellow ones use yellow wings, glowing wings instead, use no wings to remove them if they appear on their own.

  • Miscellaneous - labcoat, name tag, periscope, glowing, holding staff, hair over one eye, short hair

Checked strength range is 0.5-0.9, more weight - more Overwatch style bleeds in.
If you liked my work, you can donate here.

Review and comment with your experiences, I would appreciate whatever feedback you can provide in order to continue improving my technique.

Trained on Anything V4.5 with anime.vae.pt and CLIP Skip 2.

Samples are 512x768, without HighRes.fix, using OrangeCocoa 50/50 Mix , with OrangeMix VAE, and using EasyNegative embedding, CLIP Skip 2.
